title: Tom Asks About the Team Lead
description: Learn Conversation Starters in the Break Room

contents.en: Hey, Sophie! Tell me about our team lead, Maria. What is she like?
contents.id: Hai, Sophie! Ceritakan tentang kepala tim kita, Maria. Seperti apa dia?

contents.en: Well, she's very proactive and she likes everything in order. I think she has a passion for technology, and she enjoys leading our team.
contents.id: Nah, dia sangat proaktif dan suka segala sesuatu teratur. Saya rasa dia memiliki passion untuk teknologi, dan dia menikmati memimpin tim kita.

contents.en: Those are great traits for someone in her position, I think. What does she do as the team lead?
contents.id: Itu adalah sifat-sifat hebat untuk seseorang di posisinya, menurut saya. Apa yang dia lakukan sebagai kepala tim?

contents.en: Maria coordinates our projects. She assigns tasks and makes sure everything runs well.
contents.id: Maria mengkoordinasikan proyek-proyek kita. Dia menugaskan tugas dan memastikan segalanya berjalan lancar.

contents.en: That sounds important. Where does she usually work from?
contents.id: Itu terdengar penting. Biasanya dia bekerja dari mana?

contents.en: She works from her office most of the time, but she's also in meetings a lot.
contents.id: Dia kebanyakan bekerja dari kantornya, tapi dia juga sering berada dalam pertemuan.

contents.en: I see. When does she usually hold team meetings?
contents.id: Paham. Kapan biasanya dia mengadakan pertemuan tim?

contents.en: She schedules team meetings every Monday morning to plan the week ahead.
contents.id: Dia menjadwalkan pertemuan tim setiap Senin pagi untuk merencanakan minggu ke depan.

contents.en: Got it! How does she handle challenges in our projects?
contents.id: Paham! Bagaimana dia menangani tantangan dalam proyek-proyek kita?

contents.en: Maria thinks challenges are positive. She encourages us to find solutions together.
contents.id: Maria menganggap tantangan itu positif. Dia mendorong kita untuk menemukan solusi bersama.

contents.en: Great. And do you enjoy working with her?
contents.id: Bagus. Dan apakah kamu menikmati bekerja dengannya?

contents.en: I do. She's supportive and she helps us a lot.
contents.id: Iya. Dia mendukung dan membantu kita banyak.

contents.en: Nice! Thanks for the information, Sophie.
contents.id: Bagus! Terima kasih atas informasinya, Sophie.

contents.en: You're welcome. Maria is a fantastic leader to have. I think you're in good hands.
contents.id: Sama-sama. Maria adalah pemimpin yang fantastis. Saya rasa Anda berada di tangan yang baik.
